short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Check the prices on the direct airline websites

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Our browser extension checks the prices on the direct airline websites while you are looking for the best flight on META search engines and online travel agencies (OTAs). This ensures that you're getting the most comprehensive and accurate price comparisons, so you can be confident that you're getting the best deal possible. With zero clicks, you can easily compare prices on a range of websites and find the lowest available price for your desired flight.

List of available functionalities:
– Checking the prices on airline websites
– Comparing airline fares with fares from Online Travel Agencies
– Comparing ancillaries (carry-on, baggage, priority)
